required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study With Lu AF35700 in Healthy Men and Women in Fasting and Fed State
clinical_study.official_title: Interventional, Open-label, Two-way Crossover, Single-dose Study Investigating the Absolute Bioavailability and Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Lu AF35700 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the extent to which Lu AF35700 enters the bloodstream following pill intake and the influence of food on the uptake in healthy men and women

detailed_description.textblock:
Each subject will receive a single oral dose of Lu AF35700 on Day 1 in each Period. Subjects in Group 1 will be in fasting condition in Period I and in a fed condition in Period II. Subjects in Group 2 will be in fed condition in Period I and in fasting condition in Period II.
For Group 1, period 1 only, a single intravenous micro-dose of Lu AF35700 will be given 4 hours after oral dosing.
All subjects will be confined to the clinic from one day prior to the first dosing until Day 6 (120 hours post dose) for each dosing period. Periods I and II will be separated by a period of 6 weeks.

primary_outcome.description: Fabs= 100*(AUC0-72h, po*Div) / (AUC0-72h, iv*Dpo) (where D is the dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-inf: area under the Lu AF35700 plasma concentration-time curve from zero to 72 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from zero to 72 hours for Lu AF35700
Maximum observed plasma concentration of Lu AF35700

secondary_outcome.measure: tmax: time at maximum observed plasma concentration
secondary_outcome.description: Time at which maximum observed plasma concentration of Lu AF35700 occurred

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group 1: Fasting condition in Period I
arm_group.description: Subjects will be in fasting condition in Period I and in a fed condition in Period II.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group 2: Fed condition in Period I
arm_group.description: Subjects will be in fed condition in Period I and in fasting condition in Period II.

intervention.description: 20 mg Lu AF35700 single oral dose
intervention.arm_group_label: Group 1: Fasting condition in Period I
Group 2: Fed condition in Period I

intervention.description: 100 μg [14C]-Lu AF35700 (4.7 μCi/174 kBq) single intravenous micro-dose
intervention.arm_group_label: Group 1: Fasting condition in Period I

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and women aged ≥18 and ≤55 years
- Body Mass Index (BMI) of ≥18.5 and ≤30 kg/m2
- Subject must be in good general health as assessed using medical history, clinical laboratory tests, and physical examination
Exclusion Criteria:
- The subject must not be of childbearing potential (if a woman) or should use contraception, be surgically sterilized or not be sexually active (both sexes). Women must not be pregnant or lactating
- The subject must not be a CYP2D6 or a CYP2C19 poor metabolizer
Other inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
